extendedInfo.description: Turkey Blast: Reloaded is action-packed customizable arcade shooting fun for everyone!- Tablet and phone support- 12 different turkeys- 14 unlockable weapons- 12 unique locations- 5 different powerups- 6 prize categories and more than 60 unlockable prizes- Change weapons, targets, music, backgrounds and more using prizes you unlock- Unlimited levels and bonus rounds- Intuitive controls - tilt to aim, touch to fireEvery game session awards you coins that can be used to unlock a heap of in-game prizes including: weapons, turkeys, background music, scenes and obstacles. How do you like your turkey? Rare? Shish-kebab? Roasted? How about BBQ? With Turkey Blast: Reloaded the choice is yours! Each of the 14 unlockable weapons delivers a unique (and bizarre!) way of dishing out punishment to those turkeys!Like this game? Then check out the other free Ezone.com games Team Awesome, Diversion and Crazy Snowboard!

reviews.title: Doesn\'t move well
reviews.comment: Great graphics, However was not able to move the cross hairs up an down (aka how you aim) on my tablet (4.0 ics)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads placed in game screen result in this game being useless
reviews.comment: I understand the need to have people buy the full game, but the ads are placed in a position that causes the player to not be able to see an area of the screen that is vital. The chances of shooting the gifts falling from the sky are greatly deminished. I must say, i see no point in keeping this game for this reason, & I now feel cheated to the point where I do not ever want to virtually shoot a turkey for sport through this game app ever again. No, i will not be buying the premium version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great game shooting jelly best lol works great on se Xperia Play but would be better if you could turn motion of and are able to use DPAD instead
